thread.title: ALERT: Russian Jets Repeatedly Buzz US Destroyer… It’s Getting Worse
thread.title_full: ALERT: Russian Jets Repeatedly Buzz US Destroyer… It’s Getting Worse

author: Harris
title: ALERT: Russian Jets Repeatedly Buzz US Destroyer… It’s Getting Worse
text:
First, a single Russiian Su-24 attack jet buzzed the destroyer, according to NBC News , followed later by a pair of Su-24s, then another IL-38 transport aircraft committed another low flyby. 
“These incidents are always concerning because they could result in miscalculation or accident,” Hernandez added. 
Miscalculation is a term that is often used by the military to describe an action that could lead to fire being exchanged by respective military forces — fire that should not and would not occur if there were no dangerous maneuvers attempted near U.S. military property. Advertisement - story continues below 
Reportedly, the Russian aircraft performed the flybys without their electronic identifying transponders activated. These responders are monitored closely by shipboard air defense officers to protect their ship and identify hostile and friendly aircraft via radar. 
This is becoming dangerous. Russia is starting to act out like a child throwing a temper tantrum, and we cannot let them play around because it could end up in unnecessary danger to American forces. 
We will stay on top of these developing incidents. 
Share this story on Facebook and Twitter and be sure to add your thoughts to the comment section below. Advertisement - story continues below
